channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- ovirt-engine-metrics
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- ovirt-engine-metrics

item.title: CVE-2019-10194|2024-08-04T22:17:18.907Z -- red%20hat -- ovirt-engine-metrics
item.description: Sensitive passwords used in deployment and configuration of oVirt Metrics, all versions. were found to be insufficiently protected. Passwords could be disclosed in log files (if playbooks are run with -v) or in playbooks stored on Metrics or Bastion hosts.
